create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts spiritual rap visual
Primary request: Har Har Bole Om Namasivayo hook at Haridwar.
Scene/background: Haridwar ghats at sunrise with flowing Ganga and temple architecture
Subject: riverfront steps, saffron flags, glowing morning mist
Action: 0-2s fast pattern interrupt over river; 2-8s sweeping ghat reveal; 8-12s focus on flowing river and bells
Camera: vertical 9:16 fast cuts with stabilized push-ins every 2 seconds
Lighting/mood: golden sunrise with atmospheric haze
Color palette: warm gold, saffron, river blue
Style/format: contemporary high-energy shorts style, cinematic realism, no text overlays
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no branded text, no identifiable real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, text artifacts, logos, watermark, deformed faces
